Body:
csd = preprocessing.CreateScoreDifferential('home_score', 'away_score',
    'offense_home', score_differential_colname='score_diff', copy=False)
input_data = pd.DataFrame({'home_score': [1, 2, 3, 4], 'away_score': [10, 0,
    5, 15], 'offense_home': [True, True, True, True]})
expected_data = pd.DataFrame({'home_score': [1, 2, 3, 4], 'away_score': [10,
    0, 5, 15], 'offense_home': [True, True, True, True], 'score_diff': [-9,
    2, -2, -11]})
csd.fit(input_data)
csd.transform(input_data)
pd.util.testing.assert_frame_equal(expected_data.sort_index(axis=1),
    input_data.sort_index(axis=1))
